member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection
member.summary: JSONArrayCollection is an ordered collection of values. An array begins with "[" (left bracket) and ends with "]" (right bracket). Array elements are separated by "," (comma).

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection
member.summary:
JSONValueCollection represents any collection in JSONSharp. It is used to represent arrays of values to be contained within a JSON-compliant string of characters.
A JSONValueCollection is itself a JSONValue object.

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue
member.summary:
JSONValue represents the core object in JSONSharp. It is used to represent values to be contained within a JSON-compliant string of characters.
A JSON value can be a string in double quotes, a number, true or false, null, an object or an array. These structures can be nested.

member.name: F:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue.HORIZONTAL_TAB
member.summary: Named element to represent a horizontal tab character. Used for PrettyPrint().

member.name: F:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue.CURRENT_INDENT
member.summary: Static counter used for PrettyPrint().

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue.ToString
member.summary: Any implementation must override the base ToString() method, used for producing the contained object data in JSON-compliant form.
member.returns: The value as a string, formatted in compliance with RFC 4627.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Any implementation must override PrettyPrint(), used for rendering the contained object data in JSON-compliant form but with indentation for readability.
member.returns: The value as a string, indented for readability.

member.name: F:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.JSONVALUE_SEPARATOR
member.summary: Named element for the separation character for this JSONValue object.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.CollectionToPrettyPrint
member.summary: Any implementation must override CollectionToPrettyPrint(), used for rendering the contained object data in JSON-compliant form but with indentation for readability.
member.returns: The value as a string, indented for readability.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.CollectionToString
member.summary: Any implementation must override the base ToString() method, used for producing the contained object data in JSON-compliant form.
member.returns: The value as a string, formatted in compliance with RFC 4627.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.ToString
member.summary: Required override the base ToString() method. Writes contained data using the abstract CollectionToString() method, bounded by the BeginMarker and EndMarker properties.
member.returns: The value as a string, formatted in compliance with RFC 4627.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of PrettyPrint(). Utilizes the CollectionToPrettyPrint() method, required by implementors of this class.
member.returns: The value as a string, indented for readability.

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.BeginMarker
member.summary: Any implementation must override the BeginMarker property, used for denoting the lead wrapping character for the collection type.

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValueCollection.EndMarker
member.summary: Any implementation must override the EndMarker property, used for denoting the trailing wrapping character for the collection type.

member.name: F:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.Values
member.summary: Internal generic list of JSONValue objects that comprise the elements of the JSONArrayCollection.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue})
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a generic list of JSONValue objects.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Empty public constructor. Use this method in conjunction with the Add method to populate the internal array of elements.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.Add(Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue)
member.summary: Adds a JSONValue to the internal object array. Values are checked to ensure no duplication occurs in the internal array.
member.param: JSONValue to add to the internal array

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.CollectionToPrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the CollectionToPrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: the entire collection as a string in JSON-compliant format, with indentation for readability

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.CollectionToString
member.summary: Required override of the CollectionToString() method.
member.returns: the entire collection as a string in JSON-compliant format

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.BeginMarker
member.summary: Required override of the BeginMarker property

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonArrayCollection.EndMarker
member.summary: Required override of the EndMarker property

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection
member.summary: JSONObjectCollection is an unordered set of name/value pairs. An object begins with "{" (left brace) and ends with "}" (right brace). Each name is followed by ":" (colon) and the name/value pairs are separated by "," (comma).

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue,Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue})
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a Dictionary of name/value pairs.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Empty public constructor. Use this method in conjunction with the Add method to populate the internal dictionary of name/value pairs.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.Add(Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue,Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonValue)
member.summary: Adds a JSONStringValue as the "name" and a JSONValue as the "value" to the internal Dictionary. Values are checked to ensure no duplication occurs in the internal Dictionary.
member.param: JSONStringValue "name" to add to the internal dictionary
JSONValue "value" to add to the internal dictionary

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.CollectionToPrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the CollectionToPrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: the entire dictionary as a string in JSON-compliant format, with indentation for readability

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.CollectionToString
member.summary: Required override of the CollectionToString() method.
member.returns: the entire collection as a string in JSON-compliant format

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.BeginMarker
member.summary: Required override of the BeginMarker property

member.name: P:Cosmo.Data.Json.Collections.MWJsonObjectCollection.EndMarker
member.summary: Required override of the EndMarker property

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONArray
member.summary: Implementa un array de valores en foprmato JSON.
member.remarks: La lista puede contener objetos del tipo: - JSONValue - JSONArray

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONArray.Writer
member.summary: Devuelve una cadena en formato JSON que representa el array.

member.summary: Rellena un array JSON con el resultado de una consulta SQL.
member.param: Los datos devueltos por una consulta.

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONObject
member.summary: Implementa un array de valores en formato JSON.
member.remarks: La lista puede contener objetos del tipo: - JSONValue - JSONArray

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONObject.Writer
member.summary: Devuelve una cadena en formato JSON que representa el array.

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonReflector
member.summary:
JSONReflector provides a convenient way to convert value and reference type objects to JSON format through reflection.
This implementation build JSON around reflected public properties of type int, float, double, decimal, byte, string, bool, enum or array. (Generics and other types may be supported at a later time.)

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonReflector.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts any object
member.param: object to be reflected/evaluated for JSON conversion

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonReflector.ToString
member.summary: Required override of the ToString() method.
member.returns: returns the internal JSONObjectCollection ToString() method

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.MWJsonReflector.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the PrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: returns the internal JSONObjectCollection PrettyPrint() method

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONWriter
member.summary: Clase que permite manejar cadenas de texto en formato JSON.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONWriter.Dequote(Cosmo.Data.Json.BufferedCharReader,System.Char)
member.summary: Return the characters up to the next close quote character. Backslash processing is done. The formal JSON format does not allow strings in single quotes, but an implementation is allowed to accept them.
member.returns: A String.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.JSONWriter.ParseHex(Cosmo.Data.Json.BufferedCharReader,System.Char[])
member.summary: Eats the next four characters, assuming hex digits, and converts into the represented character value.
member.returns: The parsed character.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.BufferedCharReader.Back
member.summary: Back up one character. This provides a sort of lookahead capability, so that one can test for a digit or letter before attempting to, for example, parse the next number or identifier.
member.remarks: This implementation currently does not support backing up more than a single character (the last read).

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.BufferedCharReader.More
member.summary: Determine if the source string still contains characters that Next() can consume.
member.returns: true if not yet at the end of the source.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.BufferedCharReader.Next
member.summary: Get the next character in the source string.
member.returns: The next character, or 0 if past the end of the source string.

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Mask
member.summary: Provides masking services where one value masks another given a test.

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonBoolValue
member.summary: JSONBoolValue represents a boolean value in JSONSharp.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonBoolValue.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Simple public instance constructor that accepts a boolean.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonBoolValue.ToString
member.summary: Required override of the ToString() method.
member.returns: boolean value for this instance, as text and lower-cased (either "true" or "false", without quotation marks)

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonBoolValue.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the PrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: this.ToString()

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue
member.summary: JSONNumberValue is very much like a C# number, except that octal and hexadecimal formats are not used.

member.name: F:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.JavaScriptNumberFormatInfo
member.summary: Number formatting object for handling globalization differences with decimal point separators

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type int

member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type double

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.#ctor(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type decimal

member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type single

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.#ctor(System.Byte)
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type byte

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.ToString
member.summary: Required override of ToString() method.
member.returns: contained numeric value, rendered as a string

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonNumberValue.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the PrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: this.ToString()

member.name: T:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue
member.summary: JSONStringValue is a collection of zero or more Unicode characters, wrapped in double quotes, using backslash escapes. A character is represented as a single character string. A string is very much like a C# string.

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Public constructor that accepts a value of type string

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue.ToString
member.summary: Required override of the ToString() method.
member.returns: contained string in JSON-compliant form

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Required override of the PrettyPrint() method.
member.returns: this.ToString()

member.name: M:Cosmo.Data.Json.Values.MWJsonStringValue.ToJSONString(System.String)
member.summary: Evaluates all characters in a string and returns a new string, properly formatted for JSON compliance and bounded by double-quotes.
member.returns: new string, in JSON-compliant form
